Name: Maiden Beloved
Title: Crowd of Bouquets: Maiden Beloved
Desc: "...As time passed, fewer and fewer courters visited her with flowers. What did it matter? For her, time had already stopped long ago on that fateful day."

Talent.Name: Maiden Beloved
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached receives healing apart from an Artifact:</color> Heal the most damaged character on your side for 1 HP (Can be triggered up to 2 times per Round)
